description:
After a day at the beach, the girls head to an inn to spend the night. However, there is a foreboding air about the shadow looking in...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai to Senritsu Kaiki File: Kowasugi! Shijou Saikyou no Gekijouban
The Super-Scary Super-Strange Files! Scariest Movie Ever with Senpai
先輩と戦慄怪奇ファイル コワすぎ! 史上最恐の劇場版
